Class UFSendServerMessageAction

Namespace
UltraForce.Library.NetStandard.Controllers.Actions
Assembly
UltraForce.Library.NetStandard.dll

UFSendServerMessageAction extends UFHttpAction<TResponse> and assumes the data received from the server will be of type string.

public abstract class UFSendServerMessageAction : UFHttpAction<string>, IUFWeightedProgress, IUFProgress, IUFQueueableAction

Methods

SendMessageAsync(HttpRequestMessage, CancellationToken)

Sends a message to the server and process the response.

This is an abstract method and must be implemented by subclasses. 

protected override Task<UFHttpAction<string>.UFServerResponse> SendMessageAsync(HttpRequestMessage aRequest, CancellationToken aToken)

Parameters

aRequest HttpRequestMessage

Request to send

aToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token

Returns

Task<UFHttpAction<string>.UFServerResponse>

The result of sending the message.
